about_the_game:
Unleash Your Medieval Might

Embark on an epic journey in V.O.I.D., a cooperative dungeon crawler that will test your skills and wits as you conquer dark fantasy realms! Choose from 5 distinct classes, each with unique abilities and playstyles, and join forces with your friends to vanquish your foes.

Battle Dark Fantasy Monsters

Face off against fearsome dark fantasy monsters as you delve deeper into treacherous dungeons. Each enemy is designed to challenge your tactics and reflexes, ensuring a heart-pounding and exhilarating experience every time you step into the fray.

Dynamic Procedurally Generated Worlds

No two playthroughs are the same in Vexation of Infinite Dungeons! Our procedurally generated worlds ensure that every session is unique, offering endless replayability and a fresh challenge with each new adventure.

Beware of Treacherous Allies

Trust is a luxury in V.O.I.D. As you progress, you'll need to keep an eye on your so-called allies, as their loyalty may falter in the face of temptation. Will you be able to survive the trials of betrayal and emerge victorious?

Conquer the Dungeon and Triumph

Master your chosen class, forge powerful alliances, and navigate the treacherous terrain to conquer the dungeon and emerge victorious. With countless challenges and surprises awaiting you in Vexation of Infinite Dungeons, you'll never want to put the keyboard down.

Get ready to unleash your medieval might in V.O.I.D. – the ultimate cooperative dungeon-crawling experience!

name: V.O.I.D. - Vexation of Infinite Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11.
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 with 3GB of video RAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Unleash your medieval might in our co-op dungeon crawler! Pick from 5 classes, confront dark fantasy monsters, loot, and watch out for backstabbing allies. Procedurally generated worlds - every playthrough is unique. Conquer the dungeon and win!
